name: rmobidva
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wrmo(s0, c0, w1), wrmo(s0, c0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrmo(s0, c0, w1), wrmo(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrmo(s0, c0, w1), wrmo(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wb(wrmo(s0, c0, w1), wrmo(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Formula-building rule for restricted existential quantifier (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
